Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

ball = script.Parent damage = 9
hitSound = Instance.new("Sound") hitSound.Name = "hitSound" hitSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=11945266" hitSound.Parent = ball hitSound.Volume = 1
while script:FindFirstChild("ShurikenPierceScript") == nil do wait() end
function onTouched(hit) if hit == nil or hit.Parent == nil then return end local humanoid = hit.Parent:findFirstChild("Humanoid") if hit.Parent.className == "Hat" then humanoid = hit.Parent.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end if humanoid ~= nil then if hitSound then hitSound:Play() end humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) if humanoid.Parent:FindFirstChild("ShurikenPierceScript") == nil then local cloneScript = script.ShurikenPierceScript:Clone() cloneScript.Parent = humanoid.Parent cloneScript.Disabled = false end end if connection then connection:disconnect() end ball.Velocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) -- have the kunai drop dead upon impact ballFloat = ball:FindFirstChild("BodyForce") if ballFloat ~= nil then ballFloat:remove() end end
connection = ball.Touched:connect(onTouched)
wait(4) ball.Parent = nil

local vCharacter = script.Parent local myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") local myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
if myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then script:Remove() end
local duration = 7.0
while duration > 0 do myHumanoid:TakeDamage(4.0) duration = duration - wait(1.0) wait(1.0) end
wait(1.0)
script:Remove()

-- Waits for the child of the specified parent local function WaitForChild(parent, childName) while not parent:FindFirstChild(childName) do parent.ChildAdded:wait() end return parent[childName] end
local NUM_OF_PROJECTILES = 8 local CIRCLE_RADIUS = 7
local Tool = script.Parent local Handle = WaitForChild(Tool, 'Handle') local SampleProjectile = Handle:Clone() SampleProjectile.CanCollide = false SampleProjectile.Transparency = 0 local Projectiles = {}
local vChar = Tool.Parent local torso = nil local RightShoulder = nil local RightArm = nil local Shooting = false local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Tool.Enabled = true function fire(dPos, missile)
local vCharacter = Tool.Parent if vCharacter == nil then return end local vHum = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if vHum == nil then return end local vPlayer = game.Players:playerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if vPlayer == nil then return end
if missile:FindFirstChild('BodyPosition') then missile.BodyPosition.position = missile.BodyPosition.position + Vector3.new(0, 8, 0) end wait(1.5) if missile:FindFirstChild('BodyPosition') then missile.BodyPosition:Destroy() end
--local missile = Tool.Handle:Clone() missile.Transparency = 0
--missile.CFrame = CFrame.new(spawnPos, spawnPos + dPos) * CFrame.Angles(math.pi/2, 0, 0)
missile.Velocity = dPos * 58 missile.RotVelocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) missile.Name = "LeafShuriken" missile.CanCollide = true
local force = Instance.new("BodyForce") force.force = Vector3.new(0, missile:GetMass()*196.1,0) force.Parent = missile
local creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Value = vPlayer creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Parent = missile
local newScript = Tool.ProjectileScript:clone() newScript.Disabled = false newScript.Parent = missile
missile.Parent = game.Workspace
debris:AddItem(missile, 3.5) end
function onActivated() if not Tool.Enabled then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
local character = Tool.Parent; local humanoid = character.Humanoid if humanoid == nil then print("Humanoid not found") Tool.Enabled = true return end local reload = 3.25 local targetPos = humanoid.TargetPoint local lookAt = (targetPos - character.PrimaryPart.Position).unit
confettiBang = Tool.Handle:FindFirstChild("ThrowSound") if confettiBang ~= nil then confettiBang.Volume = 0.6 confettiBang:Play() end
--[[ for i = 1, NUM_OF_PROJECTILES do xNoise = (math.random()-.5)*.1 yNoise = (math.random()-.5)*.1 zNoise = (math.random()-.5)*.1 fire(CFrame.Angles(xNoise, yNoise, zNoise) * lookAt)
RightShoulder.MaxVelocity = 0.5 RightShoulder.DesiredAngle = 1.9 -- 3.14 wait(0.1) end --]] Shooting = true local ProjectilesCopy = {} for projectile, _ in pairs(Projectiles) do table.insert(ProjectilesCopy, projectile) Projectiles[projectile] = nil end table.sort(ProjectilesCopy, function(a, b) return (a.Position - targetPos).magnitude < (b.Position - targetPos).magnitude end) for _, projectile in pairs(ProjectilesCopy) do projectile.Parent = Workspace coroutine.wrap(fire)(lookAt, projectile) RightShoulder.MaxVelocity = 0.5 RightShoulder.DesiredAngle = 2.5 wait(0.2) end wait(reload) Shooting = false Reload() confettiBang = Tool.Handle:FindFirstChild("ThrowSound") if confettiBang ~= nil then confettiBang.Volume = 0 end
Tool.Enabled = true end
function PointOnCircle(originX, originZ, radius, theta) local X = originX + radius * math.cos(theta) local Z = originZ + radius * math.sin(theta) return X, Z end
function Reload() for projectile, _ in pairs(Projectiles) do projectile:Destroy() end Projectiles = {} for i = 1, NUM_OF_PROJECTILES do local projectile = SampleProjectile:Clone() local X, Z = PointOnCircle(torso.Position.X, torso.Position.Z, CIRCLE_RADIUS + math.random() * 2, (2 * math.pi) * (i / NUM_OF_PROJECTILES)) projectile.CFrame = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(X, torso.Position.Y, Z)) projectile.RotVelocity = Vector3.new(math.random(), math.random(), math.random()) local bp = Instance.new('BodyPosition') bp.maxForce = Vector3.new(120, 10000, 120) bp.position = projectile.CFrame.p bp.Parent = projectile projectile.Parent = Tool Projectiles[projectile] = i --table.insert(Projectiles, projectile) end end
function AreAllProjectilesClose() local result = true for projectile, index in pairs(Projectiles) do if projectile:FindFirstChild('BodyPosition') then if not projectile.BodyPosition.position:isClose(projectile.Position, 1) then result = false end else --result = false end end return result end
local Spinning = false
function SpinProjectiles() if Spinning then return end Spinning = true while true do if Tool.Enabled and AreAllProjectilesClose() then for projectile, index in pairs(Projectiles) do if projectile:FindFirstChild('BodyPosition') then local X, Z = PointOnCircle(torso.Position.X, torso.Position.Z, CIRCLE_RADIUS + math.random() * 5, (2 * math.pi) * (index / NUM_OF_PROJECTILES)) projectile.BodyPosition.position = Vector3.new(X, torso.CFrame.p.Y, Z) Projectiles[projectile] = Projectiles[projectile] + 1 end end end wait(0.05) end Spinning = false end
local Equiping = false
function onEquipped() if Equiping then return end Equiping = true vChar = Tool.Parent torso = nil RightShoulder = nil RightArm = nil Handle.Transparency = 1 while vChar == nil or vChar.Name == "BackPack" or torso == nil or RightShoulder == nil or RightArm == nil do vChar = Tool.Parent if vChar ~= nil and vChar.Name ~= "BackPack" then torso = vChar:FindFirstChild("Torso") if torso ~= nil then RightShoulder = torso:FindFirstChild("Right Shoulder") RightArm = vChar:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") end end wait(1) end Reload() Spawn(SpinProjectiles) Equiping = false end local UnEquipping = false function onUnequipped() if UnEquipping then return end UnEquipping = true for projectile, _ in pairs(Projectiles) do projectile:Destroy() end Projectiles = {} Handle.Transparency = 0 UnEquipping = false end
script.Parent.Activated:connect(onActivated) script.Parent.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) script.Parent.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
